alert.note: Alert for Warren; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 8:32PM EDT until September 07 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Warren County in east central New York... Central Washington County in east central New York... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glens Falls North, or near Lake George Village, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Whitehall, Lake George Village, Granville, Hartford, Comstock, West Glens Falls, Glens Falls North, Poultney Village, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, South Glens Falls, Hampton, Lake George, Fort Ann, Cleverdale, South Bay and Big Hollow. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
